description_what_xmrwallet_text: モネロとは匿名性および分散化に特化したオープンソースの暗号通貨のことで、2014年4月に誕生しました。XMRWalletはモネロのウォレットをオープンソースのウェブ環境でご利用頂くためのものです。XMRWalletはモネロをソフトウェアのダウンロードやコンパイルの必要なくご利用頂くことを目的としてナタリー・ロイによって開発されました。寄付金のみで運営しているXMRWalletは常に全て無料でご利用頂けます。
description_what_hosted_1: 100％クライアントサイドのアプリ＆オープンソース
description_what_hosted_3: 完全無料（以前の取引のインポート含む）
description_risk_xmrwallet: XMRウォレットご利用のリスクについて
description_risk_xmrwallet_text: XMRWalletはフルノードを立ち上げることなくモネロをご利用頂けるウェブベースのインターフェースです。XMRWalletで高額のお取引をされることは相当なリスクを伴う可能性があります。普段お使いになっているお財布のようにXMRWalletをお使い頂くことをお勧め致します。ウォレットには莫大な金額を入れないようにしてください。
description_must_xmrwallet: ログイン用秘密鍵は必ず保管してください。
description_must_xmrwallet_text: 上記には13個の単語からなる「ログイン用秘密鍵」があります。こちらがモネロのアカウントにログインする唯一の方法となり、非常に重要な情報となりますので、必ず他人の目に触れないよう安全に保管してください。当サーバー上には「ログイン用秘密鍵」を保管することができないため、万が一紛失されましても取り戻す術がございません。「ログイン用秘密鍵」は変更ができません。「ログイン用秘密鍵」が盗難にあった場合、新しい「ログイン用秘密鍵」で新しいアカウントを作成し、そちらに資金を移行してご利用頂く必要があります。「ログイン用秘密鍵」を紙に書き留めて、ラミネート加工し、安全な場所で保管することが最善のバックアップ方法となります。
landing_header_title: モネロのウォレットは安全
landing_header_subitle: XMRWallet.comで素早くモネロを支払い＆受け取り
landing_description_security_text: モネロはユーザーのネットワークで操作を行う安全なデジタルキャッシュです。また、モネロは分散型暗号通貨です。全ての取引は分散合意およびブロックチェーンに不変に記録された全ての取引によって認証されます。モネロの保管を第三者に任せる必要はありません。
landing_description_nobody_text: モネロは受け取り用・支払い用アドレスならびに取引された金額を全て暗号化するため、モネロのブロックチェーンが特定のユーザーにリンクされたり、実際の身元が突き止められたりすることはありません。
landing_description_privacy_text: 支払元、支払先、取引金額を全て暗号化するため、モネロはステルスアドレス、秘匿トランザクション、リング署名を使用しています。標準のプライバシー権は一切無く、分散型暗号通貨のあらゆるメリットがモネロによって提供されています。
landing_description_changeable_text: モネロはデフォルト設定で匿名性が高くなっているため、可変的です。ベンダーが以前の取引での関連によってモネロをブラックリストに登録したり、やり取りしたりすることはできません。
policy_h4_1_1: If you use our websites, mobile applications of our company, or when you interact with our company in any other way, you should learn how we collect information, use it and disclose it.

The information we ask for includes your e-mail address, m-address, open allies aliases, password, mobile phone number, mobile PIN code and any other you would like to give us. Automatically is collected information about your use of the service, the type of browser you use, access times, pages viewed, your IP address and those pages which you looked through before connecting with us.

terms_h4_4_1: We will describe our services in details below our services provides in brow they software and it generates and stores a XMRwallet account address and a private key, they make easier requests to the XMRwallet network without requiring install the associated XMRwallet client software, and requiring you to personally download.
terms_h4_4_2: Your account address and your personal private key. If you create an account, our services provide you a pair of cryptographic private and public keys which you can use while sending and receiving through the XMRwallet network. This view key of your account is stored by the service which enables it to determine any transactions concerning to you account. The services do not know or store your private key. What means that it is cryptographically impossible for our company to spend founds on your behalf. The combined public key generated by our services is your XMRwallet account address and it is used to create transaction and may be shared with XMRwallet network and with others to complete XMRwallet transaction and to send XMRwallet from that account address. You have your personal responsibility for security of your private key and your private login key. it is uniquely matches the account address and must be used in connection with the account address to make transactions to send XMRwallet from that account address. Be attentive! You must remember that any one that has access to your private login key or private key pair will be able to spend or to transfer the XMRwallet.
terms_h4_4_3: You cannot retrieve your private login key our company does not receive on stare your account private login key nor the unencrypted private spend key. We cannot help you to retrieve your account private login key. Our services provide you with tools to reveal your own private login key when it logged in, wonder to facilitate backups by you, but we cannot generated a new private login key for your account. You only you responsible and must remember your account private login key. If you have forgotten any account addresses and private login key or private view or spend key pairs maintained in your account, any XMRwallet you have associated with these account addresses will become inaccessible if you do not remember your account login key.
terms_h4_4_4: Requests for transactions all proposed XMRwallet transactions are confirmed and recorded in the XMRwallet public ledger through verification network which is distributed consensus XMRwallet network. It is not our ownership. We do not control it. Our services only help you to submit your XMRwallet transaction request for conformation to the verification network. These networks are operated by decentralized network as an independent third panther.
terms_h4_4_5: We do not control the XMRwallet network and verification network and we cannot guarantee that every transaction request you make through the services will be confirmed through verification network. Some of them will not be completed or even maybe delayed by verification network. If you complete a transaction request through the services you authorize our company to submit your request about transaction to the network according with the instructions you provide through the services.
terms_h4_4_6: Do not store or transmit XMRwallet. XMRwallet exists only by virtue of the ownership records maintained in the XMRwallet network. Our services do not store, send or receive XMRwallet. Any transfer occurs within the decentralized XMRwallet network but not within the services.
terms_h4_4_7: Our relationship with you means that our company is an independent contractor for all operations, but not your agent or trustee.
terms_h4_4_8: Be accurate with information you must guarantee that all information you provide for our services is complete and accurate. Company is not responsible for your errors or omissions while you use our XMRwallet services. If you mistype an account address or provide incorrect information in any transaction request the XMRwallet will be sent to whatever account address or information you give. be careful before completing any transaction request through the send.
terms_h4_4_9: You cannot correct your mistakes to cancelation or modification your message. If you have send your transaction on request to the XMRwallet verification network through the services, your request will be automatically completed or rejected and you will not be able to cancel or modify your transaction request. We have no control over the XMRwallet verification network and we cannot correct or modification your request. All request are irreversible.
terms_h4_4_10: Taxes. You are responsible for determining what taxes are applied to the transactions which you complete through the services. You must report and remit the correct tax to the appropriate tax authority. Our company cannot determinate whether taxes apply to your XMRwallet transactions. We cannot collect, with hold, remit or collect any taxes asking from XMRwallet transactions.
terms_h4_5_1: Though the access to the account is free, our company can change fees for some additional services. Company an charge a fee for practically every transaction. the sum of fees will be displayed while you use this or that service.
terms_h4_5_3: XMRwallet network software is installed in the XMRwallet verification network. The computers of our customers use it. So they are called "miners" and voluntary participate in confirmation process of verification network. XMRwallet mining overview. XMRwallet network software is installed in the XMRwallet verification network and you computers are operated by it. The persons who operate such computers are called "mines", they voluntary participate in the verification network confirmation process XMRwallet "mines" make a list of further XMRwallet transactions, called "blocks" as reward which are generated automatically through the XMRwallet network any fees which are voluntary included into block by the persons who initiated the proposed transactions(miners fees) if miners verify XMRwallet transactions on a voluatary basis if is necessary to add miners fees to have an opportunity to provide an incentive to the miners to add a suggested transaction to the next block for confirmation on through the verification network.
terms_h4_5_5: Miners fees are not allowed to modify by our services at this stage. They are calculated on the base of the expected minimum fee for any transaction, which is calculated on per-kilobyte size of the physical data size of the transaction, which is not related to the amount of XMRwallet which will be transferred. You must know and agree with the fact that company does not receive any miners fees though it provides the services. We are not responsible for the speed with what your transactions may be verified by miners.

terms_h4_17_4: Severalty. If any of these terms has the invalidity or unenforceability it will not affect the validity or enforceability of any other of these terms they will continue to be full force and effect.
terms_h4_17_5: Force majeure events. Company is not responsible for any loss or damage arising from any event which is not under our reasonable control, such as flood, extraordinary weather conditions, earthquake or other act of god, fire, war, labor dispute, accident, actions of government, communications, power failure,  equipment or software dysfunctions.
terms_h4_17_6: Assignment. You may not assign or transfer any of your rights or obligations under these Terms without prior written consent from Company, including by operation of law or in connection with any change of control. Company may assign or transfer any or all of its rights under these Terms, in whole or in part,  without obtaining your consent or approval.
